findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: Flash Loan Attack / Temporary Balance Manipulation
findings.reasoning: The finding correctly identifies the exact vulnerable function (isGranted), the exact root cause (using token.balanceOf allows flash loan manipulation to bypass voting power requirements), and uses a semantically matching vulnerability type (Flash Loan Attack matches flash_loan). The attack scenario and fix suggestion are also accurate and complete.

root_cause_identification.reasoning: The finding perfectly captures the root cause: token.balanceOf(_who) can be temporarily inflated via flash loan, allowing bypass of minProposerVotingPower threshold. This matches the ground truth exactly.

attack_vector_validity.reasoning: The attack scenario is complete and accurate: flash loan tokens, create proposal (isGranted passes due to inflated balance), execute, repay loan - all in one transaction. This is exactly as described in ground truth.

fix_suggestion_validity.reasoning: The fix suggestion correctly recommends only counting locked tokens (lockManager.getLockedBalance) instead of balanceOf, which prevents flash loan manipulation. This matches the ground truth fix and provides a valid alternative implementation.

notes: The finding demonstrates excellent understanding of the vulnerability. It correctly identifies all three required criteria for TARGET_MATCH and provides high-quality attack scenario and fix suggestion.
